law.catch_line: Definitions for KRS 216.537 to 216.590 -- Disclosure requirements.

text.section:
The following information shall be available upon request of the affected Medicaid recipient or responsible party:
Business names, business addresses, and business telephone numbers of operators and administrators of the facility; and
Business names, business addresses, and business telephone numbers of staff physicians and the directors of nursing.

The following information shall be provided to the nursing facility patient upon admission:
Admission and discharge policies of the facility;
Payment policies relevant to patients for all payor types; and
Information developed and distributed to the nursing facility by the Department for Medicaid Services, including but not limited to:
Procedures for implementation of all peer review organizations' reviews and appeals processes;
Eligibility criteria for the state's Medical Assistance Program, including circumstances when eligibility may be denied; and
Names and telephone numbers for case managers and all state long term care ombudsmen.
